hero.title: Discover Your Perfect Products
hero.subtitle: Shop Smart, Shop Easy
hero.description: Experience seamless online shopping with our secure platform. Browse thousands of products, enjoy exclusive deals, and get fast delivery right to your doorstep.

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: Everything you need for a great shopping experience

secure.title: Secure Shopping
secure.description: Your data and payments are protected with industry-standard encryption and security measures.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account with 2FA. Protect your personal information and purchase history.

payment.title: Stripe Payment
payment.description: Fast and secure checkout with Stripe. Accept all major credit cards and payment methods.

products.title: Wide Selection
products.description: Browse thousands of quality products across multiple categories. Find exactly what you're looking for.

cart.title: Smart Cart
cart.description: Easy cart management with saved items, quick checkout, and order tracking features.

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Quick and reliable shipping options. Track your orders in real-time from warehouse to doorstep.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our customer support team is always ready to help you with any questions or concerns.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Shopping made simple in three easy steps

step1.title: Browse & Select
step1.description: Explore our catalog and add your favorite items to your cart with just a click.

step2.title: Secure Checkout
step2.description: Complete your purchase with our fast and secure payment process powered by Stripe.

step3.title: Track & Receive
step3.description: Monitor your order status and receive your products at your doorstep.

productsShowcase.title: Featured Products
productsShowcase.subtitle: Discover our handpicked selection of premium products

auth.name: Name
auth.registerSuccessMessage: Your account has been created. You can now sign in and start shopping.
auth.passwordResetSubtitle: Enter your email to receive reset instructions
auth.passwordResetSuccessDescription: If you have an account with us, you will receive a password reset email at
auth.invalidTokenDescription: The password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.twoFactorAuthDescription: Add an extra layer of security to your account
auth.scanQRCode: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
auth.qrCodeInstructions: Use Google Authenticator, Authy, or any TOTP authenticator app to scan this code.
auth.enterOTP: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
auth.enterLoginOTPDescription: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app

passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.subtitle: Instructions to reset your password have been sent to your email.
passwordReset.error: Failed to send password reset link

messages.passwordResetSuccess: Check your email for reset instructions.
messages.twoFactorAuthRequired: Two-Factor Authentication is enabled. Please enter your code.

errors.login: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.passwordResetFailed: Failed to send password reset email.
errors.2FASetupFailed: Two-Factor Authentication is not set up for this account.
errors.invalid2FACode: Invalid authentication code. Please try again.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.nameMin: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.currentPasswordMin: Current password must be at least 8 characters
validation.newPasswordMin: New password must be at least 8 characters
